name: df-md
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmd, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cch), wcel(cv(s1), cch)), wral(s2, cch, wi(wss(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wceq(cin(co(cv(s2), chj, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), chj, cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
comment: Define the modular pair relation (on the Hilbert lattice). Definition 1.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 1, who use the notation (x,y)M for "the ordered pair <x,y> is a modular pair." See ~ mdbr for membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
